I/O I/O Functions calls
Inicia o sistema de arquivos.
Configure GPIOs as OUTPUTs
This function configures the GPIOs as OUTPUTs. The GPIOs are used to control the indicators, valves, pump, and resistor.
Inicia os outputs.
Configure GPIOs as INPUTs
This function configures the GPIOs as INPUTs. The GPIOs are used to read the state of the switches and sensors.
Inicia os inputs.

Write all outputs from the image array to the GPIOs
This function writes all the outputs from the image array to the GPIOs. The image array is used to store the current state of the inputs and outputs.
